title: Department of Food Technology
bannerCon: The University of Wyoming welcomes students to experience a one-of-a-kind education in the heart of the Mountain West.

items.subTitle: Overview
items.contents: The Department of Food Technology being established in 2018. The Department offers Bachelor in Technology programme in Food Technology (B.Tech).The Department has a strong academic background with highly qualified faculty to provide excellent teaching, practical training and to inculcate research in the frontier areas of Food Technology.

items.title: Laboratories
content: B.Tech. Food Technology Laboratory
Food Chemistry Laboratory

items.title: Career Counseling
content: Ms. Kayalvizhi Balasubramanian, Assistant Director, MSME Development Institute, Coimbatore, counseled on “Information on Opportunity in Food Technology” on July 12, 2019.

items.title: Guest Lectures
content: Dr. V. E. Ida Christi delivered a guest lecture on “Food as Nutrient and Medicine” on December 31, 2020.
Dr. Preethi Marimuthu delivered a guest lecture on “Probiotics- Gut health, Immunity, Safety, Industry and Economic Impact” on December 29, 2020.
Dr. R. Balakrishnaraja delivered a guest lecture on “Value Addition of Food Products” on December 28, 2020.
Dr. P. Karthik delivered a special lecture on “Recent Developments in Micro and Nanoencapsulation of Food Bioactive Ingredients by Spray Drying” on December 26, 2020.
Dr. C. Jusci Kumar delivered a guest lecture on “Food Processing Technology in Bakery” on December 12, 2020.
Dr. J. Prakash Maran delivered a guest lecture on “Microorganisms and Food Technology” on December 31, 2020.
Mr. Godwin Berlin Dass delivered a guest lecture on “Unit Operations in Dairy Processing” on February 14, 2020.
Ms. Kayalvizhi Balasubramanian delivered a guest lecture on “Opportunity in Food Technology” on July 12, 2019.
Dr. S. Gobikrishnan delivered a guest lecture on “Engineering Aspects in Food Technology” on August 28, 2019.
Dr. R. K. Sumathi delivered a guest lecture on “Food Borne Illness” on September 06, 2019.
Dr. T. V. Ranganathan delivered a guest lecture on “Application of Food Analysis in Assessing Food Quality” on January 22, 2020.

items.title: Food Technology Association
content: Dr. Saraswati Eswaran inaugurated the Association of Food Technology and delivered a keynote address on “New and Novel Challenges for Foodpreneurs” on August 28, 2019.

items.title: Industrial Visits
content: Two-day industrial visit to Hindustan Coca-Cola Beverages Pvt. Ltd., Garuda Polyflex Foods, and Indo-American Hybrid Seeds, Bengaluru.

items.title: World Food Day Celebration
content: National Level World Food Day Celebration on October 16, 2020 with keynote address by Dr. C. Anandharamakrishnan on future prospects of Food Processing Technology.
World Food Day Celebration on October 16, 2019 with keynote address by Mr. Umakant Singh on plant design in food safety.

items.title: Extension Activity
content: Tribal Interaction Programme on Millets at Baralikadu on 13.12.2025 with 50 students and five faculty members.
Awareness Program on Food Adulterants at Malumichampatty on September 04, 2019.

items.title: Field Visit
content: ABT Group of Industries (Sakthi Dairy Division), Pollachi on July 31, 2019.
Zenith Medical Equipments, Coimbatore on December 10, 2019.
Synthite Industries Private Limited, Karamadai on January 27, 2020.

items.title: Value Added Course
content: Value Added Course on “Food Product Development”.
